modName: Plain Black Gloves Boots Hood and Robe
summary: Just added a standalone plain black gloves to the smithy so I can craft them.
descriptionHtml:
There are now black gloves, black boots, black hood and black robes.
All items are ready for enchanting.

Crafting requirements: 
Gloves Require 1 Leather, 1 Leather Strips.
Boots Require 1 Leather, 2 Leather Strips.
Robe Requires 1 Leather, 1 Leather Strips and 5 Tundra Cotton.
Hood Requires 2 Leather Strips, 3 Tundra Cotton.

Nothing amazing just a retexture of Bethesda\'s in-game Gloves, Boots, Apprentice Robe and Hood.

There are some clipping issues with the gloves and hood which was present in the original. In fact the hood is actually a problem with ONE of the hairstyles in the game - is there for all the mage hoods. If anyone could fix that, I would happily update and release a fix for the original brown ones as well.

Like I said, there\'s nothing special about this but the outfit \"works\" and is good for when you\'re low level but don\'t want to look really stupid... as mages\'s do at low level usually ;)

Please Endorse if you find it useful.
author: thefinn

files.name: Plain Black Mage Gear
files.changelogHtml: Hopefully fixed gloves not being enchantable.
